product.title: Indonesia Tropical Curtain

relproducts.title: Indonesia Tropical Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Give your room a pick-me-up with the bright and breezy indonesia tropical roman blind. Flaunting a floral motif in zesty, invigorating tones, this fully lined cotton blind exudes a distinctly fresh and tropical vibe. When raised via the sidewinder chain, this blind folds up into neat pleats and is a stylish and space saving window covering that is elegant in its simplicity. relproducts.title: Dragonfly Tropical Sunset - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Tropical sunset is a blend of colours that allows you to lose yourself in the moment and celebrate the free artistic expression that brings the design to life. The calming blues and passionate pinks evoke memories of time spent outside in the sun -just what you need to brighten any day. If you want to add a statement piece to the dining room there's no better way to do it than choosing your favourite colour from tropical sunset.
